name: EazyFilter – The Easiest Produt Filter Plugin for WooCommerce (WooCommerce Ajax Product Filter)
author: EazyPlugins

sections.description:
Do you feel like you need to be a wizard when creating a custom filter for your WooCommerce? Are you tired of trudging through an arcane tutorial to figure out how to offer simple filtering based on various parameters to your users? If you are lost in the world of WooCommerce filtering, Eazy Filter is here for your rescue.

üëâ Check out our website for more details about EazyFilter : View Demo

Eazy Filter is a handy Elementor Powered product filter plugin for WooCommerce that comes with numbers of useful shortcodes which can be used across your site. It lets you filter products based on categories, attributes, product tags, price, color swatches, and more. Eazy Filter is always compliant with the latest WooCommerce & Elementor, so your filters will always keep on working. We will also keep updating Eazy Filter to always be in sync with all future Elementor and WooCommerce versions. Eazy Filter will make product owner‚Äôs life easier with our state-of-the-art setup system. Eazy Filter is so easy to use that you can be up and running with creating new filters in about 5 minutes. Say goodbye to the dull and tedious process of setting up filtering, and welcome to Eazy Filter.

Eazy Filter really stands out from other filter plugins currently available in the market. Be it for the hand crafted setup wizard that makes setting up initial filters a breeze or the expertly researched options that puts just the right amount of control to your hand, there‚Äôs always a reason to check out Eazy Filter. Let‚Äôs dive into the feature set now.

Standalone Shortcode and Elementor Version:

Eazy Filter comes with a collection of intuitively designed widgets for Elementor page builder so that you can feel at home when integrating these filters on your shop page or any other page using a built-in product grid widget that adheres to your workflow. Besides, you can integrate these filters anywhere using shortcodes that come bundled with Eazy Filter, so you are not limited to using only Elementor.

Responsive:

Eazy Filter is fully responsive, so you can filter your WooCommerce items even when you are on the go. Laptop, Tablet, or even iPad, Eazy Filter adapts to your workflow.

Unlimited Filters & Filter Groups:

Eazy Filter can create unlimited Filters. But that‚Äôs the boring part; with Eazy Filter, you can also create unlimited Filter Groups where you can apply multiple filters by clicking in a single grouped filter. So go ahead and unleash your creativity.

Compatible With All WordPress Themes & PHP Versions:

Eazy Filter works with all WordPress themes, post types, and pages. It also is compatible with all major PHP versions starting from 5.6. ‚ÄúPlugin incompatible with your setup‚Äù is a non-issue when it comes to Eazy Filter.

AJAX Based Filtering:

Eazy Filter supports AJAX-based filtering that enables easy, quick, and convenient filtering capability based on your product category, tag, attributes (size, color, weight, material, etc.). No reload is needed!

AJAX Pagination on Filtering:

You‚Äôd think that something as trivial as AJAX Pagination after filtering works on all major filtering plugins. But you‚Äôd be wrong. Our secret algorithm (which isn‚Äôt a secret anymore) solved this pagination issue. Now you can always browse through pages after filtering. Forward & Back!!

Gorgeous UI & UX:

Eazy Filter is designed with aesthetics in mind. Most WooCommerce filtering plugins in the market are complicated, cumbersome, and non-intuitive to use, except Eazy Filter. Eazy Filter makes complex and mundane tasks like creating, organizing & maintaining a filter group easy & fun.

Seamless Filtering From Inside Elementor:

With Eazy Filter, you never have to leave Elementor while creating a filter. Eazy Filter offers seamless filtering capability when you are inside Elementor.

Shortcode:

Eazyfilter has shortcode support. Upon creating a new filter, you can see its shortcode on the UI. With this shortcode, you can then use it on any page. Now your filters are more portable!!

Filter Based on Custom Attributes:

Eazy Filter offers filtering based on any custom product attributes like color, size weight, material, brand, any custom tag, and custom category. If you can think of a way to filter, chances are, Eazy Filter is already capable of implementing such a filter.

More features coming soon!
sections.installation:
Using The WordPress Dashboard

  1. Navigate to the Add New in the plugins dashboard
  2. Search for EazyFilter for WooCommerce
  3. Click Install Now
  4. Activate the plugin on the Plugin dashboard

Uploading in WordPress Dashboard

  1. Navigate to the Add New in the plugins dashboard
  2. Navigate to the Upload area
  3. Select eazyfilter-for-woocommerce.zip from your computer
  4. Click Install Now
  5. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard

Using FTP

  1. Download eazyfilter-for-woocommerce.zip
  2. Extract the eazyfilter-for-woocommerce directory to your computer
  3. Upload the eazyfilter-for-woocommerce directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  4. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard
sections.faq:
Can I use Eazy Filter without Elementor?

Absolutely. Although you can get some extra benefits by using Elementor, this is absolutely not a hard dependency and you can use Eazy Filter without Elementor.

Does it work along with other Elementor Addons?

Yes, it does.

Does it work with any WordPress theme?

Yes, it works with any WordPress theme.

Does it work with Elementor Pro?

Yes, undoubtedly.

Will Eazy Filter break my site after an update?

No, It won’t break your site or any page where you used Eazy Filter. We put our best effort to make you happy.

How do I get support?

You can send an email to support@eazyplugins.com with your issues and we‚Äôll get back to you

How to uninstall Eazy Filter?

From your WordPress Admin panel go to Plugins and select Eazy Filter then deactivate and then delete.

Is Eazy Filter Plugin heavy?

No. The Eazy Filter plugin is lightweight, responsive. It will not slow down your website.
sections.changelog:
1.2.0

  • New: Default design for all widgets
  • New: Meta query support
  • New: Filter product by Stock status
  • New: Filter product by price
  • New: Filter product by SKU
  • New: Filter product by on sell

1.1.1

  • Fix: Icon pack issue

1.1.0

  • New: Ordering of the terms
  • New: Filter on page reload
  • New: New widget / filter for search
  • New: Clone created filters & filter groups

1.0.5

  • New: Elementor widget compatible with WPML
  • Tweak: Newly created filter on elementor editor will be selected automatically on filter choose dropdown
  • Tweak: Add loader animation on setup wizard on load
  • Tweak: Add animation on the grid after clicking filter to get filtered product
  • Tweak: Warning message for required field on filter create form
  • Tweak: Warning for unsaved state on filter create form
  • Fix: Product counter fixed
  • Fix: Customized term initial load fixed on editing filter

1.0.4

  • Improve UI/ UX
  • Quick view fix on product grid
  • Pagination default style and style control added on product grid
  • Automacally filter type choose based on widget
  • Product count added on filter
  • Color name enable for color control

1.0.3

  • Improve UI/ UX

1.0.2

  • Improve UI/ UX
  • Improve product grid widget
  • Include uncheck all filter by one click

1.0.1

  • Optimized and improved code base

1.0.0

  • Initial release
